## ChildAddedEvent interface

When one child is added to a child list, it's emitted.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ChildAddedEvent<T> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [ADDED](./treex.js.childaddedevent.added.md) | "ADDED" | To distinguish other events, existence of this property is checked. |
|  [addedNode](./treex.js.childaddedevent.addednode.md) | [TreeNode](./treex.js.treenode.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | A added node. |
|  [children](./treex.js.childaddedevent.children.md) | ReadonlyArray&lt;[TreeNode](./treex.js.treenode.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt; |  |
|  [index](./treex.js.childaddedevent.index.md) | number | A new index of a added node in a child list. |
|  [node](./treex.js.childaddedevent.node.md) | [TreeNode](./treex.js.treenode.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | A node which a added node belonged to. |
